course.subject: MARK
course.name: Exponential Marketing Through Consumer Experience
course.description: The course aims at providing a macro overview to help students and future managers understand the role of innovation using Marketing. This course will also help managers understand the importance of the interconnections with other industries innovations. Students will learn techniques and strategies that managers use to make brands more meaningful to consumers without actual changes in the product itself so, capitalize on new marketing opportunities to increase Brand Equity.
